1:
The faster you complete a battle, the higher score
you can obtain.
2:
The higher the total percentage of all allied sync
pairs’ remaining HP when you complete a battle,
the higher score you can obtain.
3:
The more times all allied sync pairs’ stats have
been raised in total when you complete a battle,
the higher score you can obtain. If a sync pair’s
HP drops to 0 during battle, their number of stat
increases when their HP reaches 0 will
be counted.
4:
The more times all allied sync pairs’ stats have
been lowered in total when you complete a
battle, the higher score you can obtain. If a sync
pair’s HP drops to 0 during battle, their number of
stat decreases when their HP reaches 0 will
be counted.
5:
The higher the maximum damage dealt by any
ally, the higher score you can obtain.
6:
The more total times all allied sync pairs land
attacks, the higher score you can obtain.
7:
The fewer total times all allied sync pairs land
attacks, the higher score you can obtain.
